definition: work more and get more
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: I earn dividends and bonus according to company's Policy of: "more work, more gains".
sentences.chinese: 本人的獎金及分紅是根據“多勞多得”的原則發放。

sentences.english: People who are accomplishing a lot are doing a lot. Work and accomplishments are very closely related.
sentences.chinese: 多勞多得，努力和成就是密不可分的。

sentences.english: Regarding those who exercise the piece wage, their wage shall be based on the principle of "more pay for more work".
sentences.chinese: 執行定額計件工資制的，按多勞多得原則計算工資。

sentences.english: We stressed egalitarianism, but we did not find ways to ensure that those who contribute more should get more.
sentences.chinese: 我們強調平等，但是並沒有找到保證多勞多得的途徑。

definition: see 賒賬|赊账[she1 zhang4]

subtotal
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
concentration (a pair-matching game)
currency exchange rate
leave of absence request (from work or school)
fare/transport costs
to collect tax
consecutive serial numbers/chain (of supermarkets, hotels etc)/hyphen

penalty (fee)
your precious daughter
to force sb to buy or sell/to trade using coercion
